messages.title: A Record of Delivery.
messages.content: 2010 - 2015 A RECORD OF DELIVERY: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors. Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school kids.

messages.title: A Promise of More.
messages.content: 2015 - 2020 A PROMISE OF MORE: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers. Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year. Protect education spending from cradle to college.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors. Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.
Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school kids. Protect education spending from cradle to college.
